String.Source: What do neurodynes do?
String.Dest: What do neurodynes do?

String.Source: What are suppressors?
String.Dest: What are suppressors?

String.Source: Signs of a suppressor?
String.Dest: Signs of a suppressor?

String.Source: I'm ready (500 caps)
String.Dest: Já můžu (500 zátek)

String.Source: I'm Ready (250 caps)
String.Dest: Já můžu (250 zátek)

String.Source: Done with hubology
String.Dest: Done with hubology

String.Source: No, not yet
String.Dest: Ne, ještě ne

String.Source: How many alignments?
String.Dest: How many alignments?

String.Source: Neurodyne origin?
String.Dest: Neurodyne origin?

String.Source: What are neurodynes?
String.Dest: What are neurodynes?

String.Source: You're vultures
String.Dest: You're vultures

String.Source: [pay 50 caps]
String.Dest: [Zaplatit 50 zátek]

String.Source: No, not yet
String.Dest: Ne, ještě ne

String.Source: First one free
String.Dest: First one free

String.Source: Alignment?
String.Dest: Vyrovnání?

String.Source: Alien technology?
String.Dest: Alien technology?

String.Source: Do it for free
String.Dest: Udělej to zadarmo

String.Source: I'm Ready (100 Caps)
String.Dest: Já můžu (100 zátek)

String.Source: Who is Star Father?
String.Dest: Who is Star Father?

String.Source: No, not yet.
String.Dest: Ne, ještě ne

String.Source: Just a scam
String.Dest: Just a scam

String.Source: The Hub's plan?
String.Dest: The Hub's plan?

String.Source: You're charlatans
String.Dest: You're charlatans

String.Source: No more!
String.Dest: No more!

String.Source: The Hub's plan?
String.Dest: The Hub's plan?

String.Source: I'm Ready (2500 Caps)
String.Dest: Já můžu (2.500 zátek)

String.Source: No, not yet
String.Dest: Ne, ještě ne

String.Source: I'm Ready (1000 caps)
String.Dest: Já můžu (1.000 zátek)

String.Source: This is bullshit
String.Dest: To je kravina

String.Source: No, not yet
String.Dest: Ne, ještě ne

String.Source: Star Father?
String.Dest: Star Father?

String.Source: You're all nutjobs
String.Dest: You're all nutjobs

String.Source: Rule mankind?
String.Dest: Rule mankind?

String.Source: I'm ready (5000 Caps)
String.Dest: Já můžu (5.000 zátek)

String.Source: Travel to Quetzal?
String.Dest: Travel to Quetzal?

String.Source: The Hub's plan?
String.Dest: The Hub's plan?

String.Source: No, not yet
String.Dest: Ne, ještě ne

String.Source: To hell with you
String.Dest: To hell with you

String.Source: Final mystery?
String.Dest: Final mystery?

String.Source: I'm Ready (10,000 Caps)
String.Dest: Já můžu (10.000 zátek)

String.Source: You're A Dead Man
String.Dest: Seš mrtvej muž

String.Source: You Lied To Me
String.Dest: You Lied To Me

String.Source: I Get It
String.Dest: I Get It

String.Source: You're Dead
String.Dest: Jsi mrtvý

String.Source: Ever Fail?
String.Dest: Ever Fail?

String.Source: I Understand
String.Dest: Rozumím

String.Source: Boring Sob Story
String.Dest: Boring Sob Story

String.Source: You Were In On This?
String.Dest: You Were In On This?

String.Source: One Less Boss
String.Dest: One Less Boss

String.Source: Get Back To Work
String.Dest: Get Back To Work

String.Source: It Benefits Everyone
String.Dest: It Benefits Everyone

String.Source: Anything Interesting To Say?
String.Dest: Anything Interesting To Say?

String.Source: Sarcastic
String.Dest: Sarkasticky

String.Source: We're Better Off
String.Dest: We're Better Off

String.Source: Good Riddance
String.Dest: Zaplať pánbůh

String.Source: What'll You Do Now?
String.Dest: What'll You Do Now?

String.Source: You're Welcome
String.Dest: Není zač

String.Source: Raiders Deserve Death
String.Dest: Nájezdníci si zaslouží smrt

String.Source: Don't Owe Me
String.Dest: Nedlužíš mi nic

String.Source: Seen Any Stragglers?
String.Dest: Seen Any Stragglers?

String.Source: Didn't Mention Death Trap
String.Dest: Didn't Mention Death Trap

String.Source: Surprised I'm Alive?
String.Dest: Překvapuje tě, že žiju?

String.Source: This isn't enough. Come back when you have the caps.
String.Dest: This isn't enough. Come back when you have the caps.

String.Source: This is bullshit. You're all crazy and I'm not joining your cult.
String.Dest: This is bullshit. You're all crazy and I'm not joining your cult.

String.Source: Once we have control of the junkyard you can receive another alignment.
String.Dest: Once we have control of the junkyard you can receive another alignment.

String.Source: Zeta radiation destroys some of the neurodynes and drives the spirits away, but only for a short time.
String.Dest: Zeta radiation destroys some of the neurodynes and drives the spirits away, but only for a short time.

String.Source: Dara has said your treatment must wait until we have achieved our goal.
String.Dest: Dara has said your treatment must wait until we have achieved our goal.

String.Source: You are not ready for that mystery yet AHS-5. Maybe next time.
String.Dest: You are not ready for that mystery yet AHS-5. Maybe next time.

String.Source: But neurodynes prevent us from reaching it.
String.Dest: But neurodynes prevent us from reaching it.

String.Source: You are doing so well! It breaks my heart to see you so close to true enlightenment only to be distracted. Come back soon.
String.Dest: You are doing so well! It breaks my heart to see you so close to true enlightenment only to be distracted. Come back soon.

String.Source: Those are the people in your life that are suppressing your talents and abilities.
String.Dest: Those are the people in your life that are suppressing your talents and abilities.

String.Source: Who is this Star Father?
String.Dest: Who is this Star Father?

String.Source: You have just begun your journey toward enlightenment and true happiness.
String.Dest: You have just begun your journey toward enlightenment and true happiness.

String.Source: Don't give up on it now. Come back soon.
String.Dest: Don't give up on it now. Come back soon.

String.Source: How many more alignments do I need?
String.Dest: How many more alignments do I need?

String.Source: Back already AHS-6?
String.Dest: Back already AHS-6?

String.Source: We'll be treating more deeply rooted neurodynes. You'll need to donate 500 caps.
String.Dest: We'll be treating more deeply rooted neurodynes. You'll need to donate 500 caps.

String.Source: You prey on the weak, you vultures. I'm done giving you caps for worthless 'alignments.'
String.Dest: You prey on the weak, you vultures. I'm done giving you caps for worthless 'alignments.'

String.Source: What exactly do neurodynes do?
String.Dest: What exactly do neurodynes do?

String.Source: I worry about the influence of those suppressors. Don't wait too long.
String.Dest: I worry about the influence of those suppressors. Don't wait too long.

String.Source: You're all charlatans. Neurodynes! Suppressors! It's just a bunch of crazy talk. I'm done with the lot of you.
String.Dest: You're all charlatans. Neurodynes! Suppressors! It's just a bunch of crazy talk. I'm done with the lot of you.

String.Source: I'm afraid I must insist.
String.Dest: I'm afraid I must insist.

String.Source: I strongly recommend you avoid them.
String.Dest: I strongly recommend you avoid them.

String.Source: I cannot help you.
String.Dest: I cannot help you.

String.Source: You are only an AHS-3. You are still highly susceptible to suppressors. Please be careful out there.
String.Dest: You are only an AHS-3. You are still highly susceptible to suppressors. Please be careful out there.

String.Source: I'd hate to undo all the work we've accomplished so far.
String.Dest: I'd hate to undo all the work we've accomplished so far.

String.Source: The outside world will bring you into contact with suppressive influences.
String.Dest: The outside world will bring you into contact with suppressive influences.

String.Source: Very difficult to treat. However, you'll only need to donate 250 caps.
String.Dest: Very difficult to treat. However, you'll only need to donate 250 caps.

String.Source: So these alignments use alien technology?
String.Dest: So these alignments use alien technology?

String.Source: The spirits of the dead are constantly trying to influence us.
String.Dest: The spirits of the dead are constantly trying to influence us.

String.Source: We ask for a modest commitment of 100 caps for this alignment.
String.Dest: We ask for a modest commitment of 100 caps for this alignment.

String.Source: You are strapped into the chair and your central nervous system is pumped full of zeta radiation.
String.Dest: You are strapped into the chair and your central nervous system is pumped full of zeta radiation.

String.Source: Welcome back AHS-3. It is time for a fresh alignment.
String.Dest: Welcome back AHS-3. It is time for a fresh alignment.

String.Source: How do I know if someone is a suppressor?
String.Dest: How do I know if someone is a suppressor?

String.Source: They are riddled with neurodynes like you used to be.
String.Dest: They are riddled with neurodynes like you used to be.

String.Source: Neurodynes build up in your brain, clouding your ability to think.
String.Dest: Neurodynes build up in your brain, clouding your ability to think.

String.Source: This is just a scam to take my caps.
String.Dest: This is just a scam to take my caps.

String.Source: It's good to see you AHS-4. You are progressing quickly.
String.Dest: It's good to see you AHS-4. You are progressing quickly.

String.Source: You are about to be blessed by the Star Father.
String.Dest: You are about to be blessed by the Star Father.

String.Source: That's it. I'm done with Hubology. I gave it a try, but it's done nothing for me.
String.Dest: That's it. I'm done with Hubology. I gave it a try, but it's done nothing for me.

String.Source: Are you ready to throw off the shackles of your neurodynes?
String.Dest: Are you ready to throw off the shackles of your neurodynes?

String.Source: If you let it go on too long, the neurodynes will just build up in you mind, clouding your abilities.
String.Dest: If you let it go on too long, the neurodynes will just build up in you mind, clouding your abilities.

String.Source: That would not show the proper commitment on your part.
String.Dest: That would not show the proper commitment on your part.

String.Source: Isn't the first one supposed to be free?
String.Dest: Isn't the first one supposed to be free?

String.Source: I suppose I can do that.
String.Dest: To asi mohu udělat.

String.Source: The human mind has unlimited potential.
String.Dest: The human mind has unlimited potential.

String.Source: No more! I've had it with these bogus 'treatments' of yours.
String.Dest: No more! I've had it with these bogus 'treatments' of yours.

String.Source: After an alignment, you will think more clearly and be happier.
String.Dest: After an alignment, you will think more clearly and be happier.

String.Source: Anyone that tried to convince you of the rightness of their cause is almost certainly a suppressor.
String.Dest: Anyone that tried to convince you of the rightness of their cause is almost certainly a suppressor.

String.Source: Almost everyone in the Commonwealth is a suppressor, but some are worse than others.
String.Dest: Almost everyone in the Commonwealth is a suppressor, but some are worse than others.

String.Source: Their brain waves can trigger excess neurodyne activity in you.
String.Dest: Their brain waves can trigger excess neurodyne activity in you.

String.Source: We usually recommend limiting your contact with people who are not hubologists.
String.Dest: We usually recommend limiting your contact with people who are not hubologists.

String.Source: He lives on the distant planet Quetzal in the constellation of Zyphus.
String.Dest: He lives on the distant planet Quetzal in the constellation of Zyphus.

String.Source: No, not yet. I'll come back later.
String.Dest: Ne, ještě ne. Vrátím se později.

String.Source: What are neurodynes?
String.Dest: What are neurodynes?

String.Source: I thought we were friends? You wouldn't charge a friend, would you?
String.Dest: I thought we were friends? You wouldn't charge a friend, would you?

String.Source: Then please sit in the Zeta Aligner.
String.Dest: Then please sit in the Zeta Aligner.

String.Source: If you must wait, wait here with us.
String.Dest: If you must wait, wait here with us.

String.Source: It's hard to say. Probably until The Hub's grand plan begins.
String.Dest: It's hard to say. Probably until The Hub's grand plan begins.

String.Source: You are no better than the other tainted minds. You are destined to be nothing but rim meat.
String.Dest: You are no better than the other tainted minds. You are destined to be nothing but rim meat.

String.Source: I am ready.
String.Dest: Já můžu.

String.Source: You do want to free your mind and find greater happiness, don't you?
String.Dest: You do want to free your mind and find greater happiness, don't you?

String.Source: I suppose we are friends. Okay, but this is the last time.
String.Dest: I suppose we are friends. Okay, but this is the last time.

String.Source: They reach into our brains and alter our chemistry to create neurodynes.
String.Dest: They reach into our brains and alter our chemistry to create neurodynes.

String.Source: Where do neurodynes come from?
String.Dest: Where do neurodynes come from?

String.Source: The zeta radiation we administer in an alignment will destroy some of them.
String.Dest: The zeta radiation we administer in an alignment will destroy some of them.

String.Source: Alignment? My back feels fine. Or is this not a chiropractic thing?
String.Dest: Alignment? My back feels fine. Or is this not a chiropractic thing?

String.Source: Our founder, The Hub, made contact with the Star Father long ago.
String.Dest: Our founder, The Hub, made contact with the Star Father long ago.

String.Source: Is it time for another alignment already AHS-5?
String.Dest: Is it time for another alignment already AHS-5?

String.Source: Hubology takes commitment. A small donation of 50 caps shows your commitment to self-improvement.
String.Dest: Hubology takes commitment. A small donation of 50 caps shows your commitment to self-improvement.

String.Source: Have a seat in the Zeta Aligner.
String.Dest: Have a seat in the Zeta Aligner.

String.Source: He is the source of all enlightenment through the alignments he taught The Hub.
String.Dest: He is the source of all enlightenment through the alignments he taught The Hub.

String.Source: Our newest member. Welcome AHS-1. Are you ready to do battle with your neurodynes?
String.Dest: Our newest member. Welcome AHS-1. Are you ready to do battle with your neurodynes?

String.Source: We need to probe deeper, and you will have to take more rads.
String.Dest: We need to probe deeper, and you will have to take more rads.

String.Source: This is an even deeper probe with even more rads than last time. A donation of 2500 caps will cover it.
String.Dest: This is an even deeper probe with even more rads than last time. A donation of 2500 caps will cover it.

String.Source: But rest assured, The Hub received guidance from the Star Father.
String.Dest: But rest assured, The Hub received guidance from the Star Father.

String.Source: We all have a place in his grand plan.
String.Dest: We all have a place in his grand plan.

String.Source: This destroys some of the neurodynes. However, over time, they will build up again without further treatment.
String.Dest: This destroys some of the neurodynes. However, over time, they will build up again without further treatment.

String.Source: The radiation is also strong, so make sure your rads are low.
String.Dest: The radiation is also strong, so make sure your rads are low.

String.Source: But I can tell you that it will end the need for alignments. We will be forever protected from the neurodynes of malignant spirits.
String.Dest: But I can tell you that it will end the need for alignments. We will be forever protected from the neurodynes of malignant spirits.

String.Source: The tools are manmade, but the process is a gift from the Star Father through his prophet, The Hub.
String.Dest: The tools are manmade, but the process is a gift from the Star Father through his prophet, The Hub.

String.Source: What is The Hub's grand plan?
String.Dest: What is The Hub's grand plan?

String.Source: The details are restricted to AHS-6 and above.
String.Dest: The details are restricted to AHS-6 and above.

String.Source: What is The Hub's grand plan?
String.Dest: What is The Hub's grand plan?

String.Source: You are doing well AHS-2. In your last alignment I saw unhealthy attachments to suppressors.
String.Dest: You are doing well AHS-2. In your last alignment I saw unhealthy attachments to suppressors.

String.Source: I'm sure the Star Father is impressed.
String.Dest: I'm sure the Star Father is impressed.

String.Source: What are suppressors?
String.Dest: What are suppressors?

String.Source: You have advanced more quickly than any follower, even Cleansed.
String.Dest: You have advanced more quickly than any follower, even Cleansed.

String.Source: Yet Dara refuses to promote me. Me! Her most loyal follower.
String.Dest: Yet Dara refuses to promote me. Me! Her most loyal follower.

String.Source: He is the source of life on Earth. We are all his descendants.
String.Dest: He is the source of life on Earth. We are all his descendants.

String.Source: But you. You come in here and she fawns all over you.
String.Dest: But you. You come in here and she fawns all over you.

String.Source: Yes. We will end the scourge of neurodynes once and for all.
String.Dest: Ano. Skoncujeme s touhle nervydrásající Pohromou jednou provždy.

String.Source: Can you tell me more about the Star Father?
String.Dest: Can you tell me more about the Star Father?

String.Source: But we have lost our way, led astray by the neurodynes.
String.Dest: But we have lost our way, led astray by the neurodynes.

String.Source: More caps? You're all a bunch of nutjobs if you think I'm paying that. I quit.
String.Dest: More caps? You're all a bunch of nutjobs if you think I'm paying that. I quit.

String.Source: I assume you are here for your next alignment.
String.Dest: I assume you are here for your next alignment.

String.Source: I had such hopes for you. Now I have to kill you.
String.Dest: I had such hopes for you. Now I have to kill you.

String.Source: But it's up to us to provide the means. Our hard work shows our commitment to him and our worthiness to sit by his side.
String.Dest: But it's up to us to provide the means. Our hard work shows our commitment to him and our worthiness to sit by his side.

String.Source: It's taken me years to master the rank of AHS-7.
String.Dest: It's taken me years to master the rank of AHS-7.

String.Source: The donation is 10,000 caps. The radiation dose will be severe.
String.Dest: The donation is 10,000 caps. The radiation dose will be severe.

String.Source: How are we going to travel to Quetzal?
String.Dest: How are we going to travel to Quetzal?

String.Source: It will take a donation of 1000 caps for this alignment.
String.Dest: It will take a donation of 1000 caps for this alignment.

String.Source: She's going to replace me, I know it. Go on. Go to Dara. Only she can promote you to AHS-8.
String.Dest: She's going to replace me, I know it. Go on. Go to Dara. Only she can promote you to AHS-8.

String.Source: But I'm sure you won't have any problems donating 5000 caps.
String.Dest: But I'm sure you won't have any problems donating 5000 caps.

String.Source: He's been working for months to save enough caps for his next alignment.
String.Dest: He's been working for months to save enough caps for his next alignment.

String.Source: But that will all end with The Hub's grand plan.
String.Dest: But that will all end with The Hub's grand plan.

String.Source: I've told Dara that you are rising too quickly. Even Cleansed didn't promote this quickly.
String.Dest: I've told Dara that you are rising too quickly. Even Cleansed didn't promote this quickly.

String.Source: This is the last mystery for you to learn. The last alignment.
String.Dest: This is the last mystery for you to learn. The last alignment.

String.Source: Just stay away from suppressors and don't wait too long for your next alignment.
String.Dest: Just stay away from suppressors and don't wait too long for your next alignment.

String.Source: You risk undoing all of your hard work so far.
String.Dest: You risk undoing all of your hard work so far.

String.Source: The Hub persuaded the Star Father to let the true faithful live with him on the planet Quetzal.
String.Dest: The Hub persuaded the Star Father to let the true faithful live with him on the planet Quetzal.

String.Source: We will be like gods, able to do unimaginable things.
String.Dest: We will be like gods, able to do unimaginable things.

String.Source: Then we will return to Earth to rule over mankind.
String.Dest: Then we will return to Earth to rule over mankind.

String.Source: Can you tell me about The Hub's plan now?
String.Dest: Can you tell me about The Hub's plan now?

String.Source: Your donation is... lacking. Come back when you have the full amount.
String.Dest: Your donation is... lacking. Come back when you have the full amount.

String.Source: Sit in the aligner.
String.Dest: Sit in the aligner.

String.Source: Come back to me with a clear mind and healthy body.
String.Dest: Come back to me with a clear mind and healthy body.

String.Source: It's understandable that you would be nervous.
String.Dest: It's understandable that you would be nervous.

String.Source: What?! We've revealed our deepest mysteries and this is how you repay us?
String.Dest: What?! We've revealed our deepest mysteries and this is how you repay us?

String.Source: The human race will reach it's full potential under our benevolent guidance.
String.Dest: The human race will reach it's full potential under our benevolent guidance.

String.Source: It is a glorious task the Star Father has given us.
String.Dest: Je to nádherný úkol, který nám Velký Otec dal.

String.Source: There can be only one AHS-9, the highest you can be promoted is AHS-8.
String.Dest: There can be only one AHS-9, the highest you can be promoted is AHS-8.

String.Source: The Star Father can free our minds of all restraints.
String.Dest: The Star Father can free our minds of all restraints.

String.Source: To hell with all of you. Hubology is a fraud and you're all insane.
String.Dest: K čertu s vámi všemi. Hubologie je podvod a všichni jste blázni.

String.Source: Now that you are AHS-6, you are ready.
String.Dest: Now that you are AHS-6, you are ready.

String.Source: Although if it were up to me, you would wait. You are rising too quickly.
String.Dest: Although if it were up to me, you would wait. You are rising too quickly.

String.Source: We need to show our devotion by constantly fighting the influences of the neurodynes and suppressors.
String.Dest: We need to show our devotion by constantly fighting the influences of the neurodynes and suppressors.

String.Source: In a spaceship of course.
String.Dest: In a spaceship of course.

String.Source: The Star Father provided the co-ordinates of Quetzal to The Hub.
String.Dest: The Star Father provided the co-ordinates of Quetzal to The Hub.

String.Source: What is this final mystery?
String.Dest: What is this final mystery?

String.Source: Like I give a shit...
String.Dest: Like I give a shit...

String.Source: Jesus, seriously? Say something...
String.Dest: Jesus, seriously? Say something...

String.Source: I say something wrong?
String.Dest: I say something wrong?

String.Source: You still need me?
String.Dest: You still need me?

String.Source: You led me into a death trap. You're a dead man.
String.Dest: You led me into a death trap. You're a dead man.

String.Source: Hey. Just wanted to say, no hard feelings, all right?
String.Dest: Hey. Just wanted to say, no hard feelings, all right?

String.Source: You lied to me.
String.Dest: You lied to me.

String.Source: It's okay. I get it.
String.Dest: It's okay. I get it.

String.Source: Well done, AHS-2. Of course you'll need more treatments.
String.Dest: Well done, AHS-2. Of course you'll need more treatments.

String.Source: That's why we recommend only interacting with other hubologists.
String.Dest: That's why we recommend only interacting with other hubologists.

String.Source: And we're done. For now. You'll need many more treatments.
String.Dest: And we're done. For now. You'll need many more treatments.

String.Source: Good. The zeta rays are withering them.
String.Dest: Good. The zeta rays are withering them.

String.Source: You are now officially an AHS-3. Congratulations!
String.Dest: You are now officially an AHS-3. Congratulations!

String.Source: The process is complete. You are doing quite well.
String.Dest: The process is complete. You are doing quite well.

String.Source: Okay, locking onto the neurodynes.
String.Dest: Okay, locking onto the neurodynes.

String.Source: You're doing quite well AHS-5. I've rarely seen anyone progress this quickly.
String.Dest: You're doing quite well AHS-5. I've rarely seen anyone progress this quickly.

String.Source: I like watching them squirm and die.
String.Dest: I like watching them squirm and die.

String.Source: There are so many of them! What have you been doing?
String.Dest: There are so many of them! What have you been doing?

String.Source: I am also an AHS-7. Although by now I should be an AHS-8.
String.Dest: I am also an AHS-7. Although by now I should be an AHS-8.

String.Source: Someday Dara will let us know what they are.
String.Dest: Someday Dara will let us know what they are.

String.Source: 25 percent... 50 percent... 75 percent... gone.
String.Dest: 25 procent ... 50 procent ... 75 procent ... hotovo.

String.Source: Of course the rad dosage is a bit higher too.
String.Dest: Of course the rad dosage is a bit higher too.

String.Source: You seem to have gathered almost as many as I removed before.
String.Dest: You seem to have gathered almost as many as I removed before.

String.Source: Neurodynes are locked.
String.Dest: Neurodynes are locked.

String.Source: Well, some of them at least.
String.Dest: Well, some of them at least.

String.Source: You really should be more careful about the company you keep.
String.Dest: You really should be more careful about the company you keep.

String.Source: The zeta rays are destroying them.
String.Dest: The zeta rays are destroying them.

String.Source: Locking onto the neurodynes.
String.Dest: Locking onto the neurodynes.

String.Source: Neurodynes build up with exposure to infected people.
String.Dest: Neurodynes build up with exposure to infected people.

String.Source: Congratulations! You are now an AHS-1.
String.Dest: Congratulations! You are now an AHS-1.

String.Source: You will take some rads during the procedure, so make sure you are healthy before starting.
String.Dest: You will take some rads during the procedure, so make sure you are healthy before starting.

String.Source: These are more active than normal.
String.Dest: These are more active than normal.

String.Source: Good times. Good times.
String.Dest: Good times. Good times.

String.Source: There they go. All gone now.
String.Dest: There they go. All gone now.

String.Source: You've made it to AHS-7! Very impressive.
String.Dest: You've made it to AHS-7! Very impressive.

String.Source: You'll take a bit more rads than last time, so make sure you are healthy before taking this alignment.
String.Dest: You'll take a bit more rads than last time, so make sure you are healthy before taking this alignment.

String.Source: They're trying to hide. They know the end is near. There. Gone.
String.Dest: They're trying to hide. They know the end is near. There. Gone.

String.Source: That stands for Aligned Hub Seeker. You have taken the first step in a long journey.
String.Dest: That stands for Aligned Hub Seeker. You have taken the first step in a long journey.

String.Source: Sit in the zeta aligner.
String.Dest: Sit in the zeta aligner.

String.Source: AHS-6 is a rank with many responsibilities and privileges.
String.Dest: AHS-6 is a rank with many responsibilities and privileges.

String.Source: Dara is dragging her feet with my promotion.
String.Dest: Dara is dragging her feet with my promotion.

String.Source: Let me start up the zeta rays.
String.Dest: Let me start up the zeta rays.

String.Source: A newly minted AHS-4. I remember when I made that rank.
String.Dest: A newly minted AHS-4. I remember when I made that rank.

String.Source: And it's done. You are now officially an AHS-8. The first one our group has ever had.
String.Dest: And it's done. You are now officially an AHS-8. The first one our group has ever had.

String.Source: Go forth and spread the word of Hubology throughout the Commonwealth.
String.Dest: Vyjděte a šiřte slovo hubologie skrz Commonwealth.

String.Source: We cannot take you any further in Hubology.
String.Dest: We cannot take you any further in Hubology.

String.Source: It appears to be working. The neurodynes are fleeing or dying.
String.Dest: It appears to be working. The neurodynes are fleeing or dying.

String.Source: I'll warm up the zeta ray projector.
String.Dest: I'll warm up the zeta ray projector.

String.Source: Next step is to find the neurodynes and lock onto them.
String.Dest: Next step is to find the neurodynes and lock onto them.

String.Source: Why did Tula have to die? She was too young. Too young.
String.Dest: Why did Tula have to die? She was too young. Too young.

String.Source: If you need an alignment, you know where to find me.
String.Dest: If you need an alignment, you know where to find me.

String.Source: The Hub's vision is coming true.
String.Dest: The Hub's vision is coming true.

String.Source: We are forever in your debt. Without you, we would not be on the path to redemption. The path of our destiny.
String.Dest: We are forever in your debt. Without you, we would not be on the path to redemption. The path of our destiny.

String.Source: The rim will grind you down!
String.Dest: The rim will grind you down!

String.Source: For the Hub!
String.Dest: For the Hub!

String.Source: Never thought I'd live long enough to see the spaceship working.
String.Dest: Never thought I'd live long enough to see the spaceship working.

String.Source: The wheel will roll over you!
String.Dest: The wheel will roll over you!

String.Source: Here are your robes.
String.Dest: Here are your robes.

String.Source: Boss.
String.Dest: Šéf.

String.Source: Good to hear, boss. Never figured I'd find myself in this situation before. I thought for sure I'd be a goner. Well, better get back to it.
String.Dest: Good to hear, boss. Never figured I'd find myself in this situation before. I thought for sure I'd be a goner. Well, better get back to it.

String.Source: Whatever. I don't need to hear your boring sob story.
String.Dest: Whatever. I don't need to hear your boring sob story.

String.Source: Never. Couldn't afford to. It used to be me and another guy they'd send out. He thought he'd try and escape while he was out there...
String.Dest: Never. Couldn't afford to. It used to be me and another guy they'd send out. He thought he'd try and escape while he was out there...

String.Source: Another wonderful day in Nuka-Town USA.
String.Dest: Another wonderful day in Nuka-Town USA.

String.Source: You sure turned this place around, boss.
String.Dest: You sure turned this place around, boss.

String.Source: I don't have any family...living family. I lost them when Colter and his gangs took this place from us.
String.Dest: I don't have any family...living family. I lost them when Colter and his gangs took this place from us.

String.Source: Yeah... pretty much. But it's not what you think. I mean it's... it's just I didn't really have any choice in the matter.
String.Dest: Yeah... pretty much. But it's not what you think. I mean it's... it's just I didn't really have any choice in the matter.

String.Source: After that, the choice was obvious. Like I said, I'm sorry you got caught up in all this.
String.Dest: After that, the choice was obvious. Like I said, I'm sorry you got caught up in all this.

String.Source: They found him and made him watch as they tortured and killed two of our own. Then they sent him through the Gauntlet themselves.
String.Dest: They found him and made him watch as they tortured and killed two of our own. Then they sent him through the Gauntlet themselves.

String.Source: It's all right, Harvey. I understand.
String.Dest: It's all right, Harvey. I understand.

String.Source: To hell with your pitiful excuses. You're a dead man!
String.Dest: To hell with your pitiful excuses. You're a dead man!

String.Source: Ergh!
String.Dest: Ergh!

String.Source: I know, and I'm sorry. But if you ever cared about anyone, you'd do the same thing.
String.Dest: I know, and I'm sorry. But if you ever cared about anyone, you'd do the same thing.

String.Source: Did you ever fail to bring someone in?
String.Dest: Did you ever fail to bring someone in?

String.Source: Jesus, another crazy!
String.Dest: Jesus, another crazy!

String.Source: Oh come on, I was just doing my job!
String.Dest: Oh come on, I was just doing my job!

String.Source: Gotta admit, these lights are a nice touch.
String.Dest: Gotta admit, these lights are a nice touch.

String.Source: Only good thing about being sent outside... no collar.
String.Dest: Only good thing about being sent outside... no collar.

String.Source: This is not my day!
String.Dest: This is not my day!

String.Source: I was just doing my job!
String.Dest: I was just doing my job!

String.Source: Damn it!
String.Dest: Zatraceně!

String.Source: Thank God. If it's any consolation, I'm glad you made it.
String.Dest: Thank God. If it's any consolation, I'm glad you made it.

String.Source: You were in on this?
String.Dest: You were in on this?

String.Source: Hope I don't have to head back out there anytime soon.
String.Dest: Hope I don't have to head back out there anytime soon.

String.Source: Screw you!
String.Dest: Screw you!

String.Source: Hey, as long as we're cool, man. I don't want any trouble.
String.Dest: Hey, as long as we're cool, man. I don't want any trouble.

String.Source: Hey, boss. Just minding my own business.
String.Dest: Hey, boss. Just minding my own business.

String.Source: Oh come on, I was just doing my job!
String.Dest: Oh come on, I was just doing my job!

String.Source: Finally some real freedom. I gotta admit, you make it hard for me to regret luring you in there a while back.
String.Dest: Finally some real freedom. I gotta admit, you make it hard for me to regret luring you in there a while back.

String.Source: Don't worry. I'm going to get as far away from here as possible.
String.Dest: Don't worry. I'm going to get as far away from here as possible.

String.Source: I'll find someone sooner or later.
String.Dest: I'll find someone sooner or later.

String.Source: Don't worry. Someone will come along soon enough.
String.Dest: Don't worry. Someone will come along soon enough.

String.Source: Boss.
String.Dest: Šéf.

String.Source: It's working. It's really working!
String.Dest: It's working. It's really working!

String.Source: As long as it ain't us, I'm happy.
String.Dest: As long as it ain't us, I'm happy.

String.Source: Holy shit, boss. That was some reckoning you pulled off.
String.Dest: Holy shit, boss. That was some reckoning you pulled off.

String.Source: Don't worry, Harvey. You're welcome.
String.Dest: Don't worry, Harvey. You're welcome.

String.Source: Ain't no one going to argue that now.
String.Dest: Ain't no one going to argue that now.

String.Source: And on that note, I'll just get my ass back to work.
String.Dest: And on that note, I'll just get my ass back to work.

String.Source: Speaking of which, have you seen any stragglers? When I clean house, I like to be thorough.
String.Dest: Speaking of which, have you seen any stragglers? When I clean house, I like to be thorough.

String.Source: Don't gotta tell me twice.
String.Dest: Don't gotta tell me twice.

String.Source: Yeah, boss. Well, best get back to work. Don't want to look like I'm slacking on the job.
String.Dest: Yeah, boss. Well, best get back to work. Don't want to look like I'm slacking on the job.

String.Source: We're better off. We're stronger this way.
String.Dest: We're better off. We're stronger this way.

String.Source: Hell, I won't argue with you there.
String.Dest: Hell, I won't argue with you there.

String.Source: It sure is nice to have electrical power around here, though. Should keep us safe and bring more business to Nuka-World.
String.Dest: It sure is nice to have electrical power around here, though. Should keep us safe and bring more business to Nuka-World.

String.Source: We owe you so much, I don't even know where to begin... besides saying thanks.
String.Dest: We owe you so much, I don't even know where to begin... besides saying thanks.

String.Source: You don't owe me anything.
String.Dest: You don't owe me anything.

String.Source: Hey, boss. Looks like you really lit this place up.
String.Dest: Hey, boss. Looks like you really lit this place up.

String.Source: I'm so glad the traders approve, I was hoping to win their popularity contest.
String.Dest: I'm so glad the traders approve, I was hoping to win their popularity contest.

String.Source: Haven't seen any of 'em since they went for the Power Plant.
String.Dest: Haven't seen any of 'em since they went for the Power Plant.

String.Source: What'll you do now?
String.Dest: Co budeš dělat teď?

String.Source: Do you have anything interesting to say? Or are you just wasting my time?
String.Dest: Do you have anything interesting to say? Or are you just wasting my time?

String.Source: I guess this means one less boss to push you guys around.
String.Dest: I guess this means one less boss to push you guys around.

String.Source: I hate Raiders. Those parasites deserved exactly what they got.
String.Dest: I hate Raiders. Those parasites deserved exactly what they got.

String.Source: Heh. I guess that is a sort of victory for us traders.
String.Dest: Heh. I guess that is a sort of victory for us traders.

String.Source: I never thought I'd say it, but I sure am glad you ended up at Nuka-World.
String.Dest: I never thought I'd say it, but I sure am glad you ended up at Nuka-World.

String.Source: You've no idea. If you ask me, we owe you our lives.
String.Dest: You've no idea. If you ask me, we owe you our lives.

String.Source: Surprised to hear the Operators actually thought they could take you on. Believe me, I won't miss 'em.
String.Dest: Surprised to hear the Operators actually thought they could take you on. Believe me, I won't miss 'em.

String.Source: Maybe now we can restore this place back to its former glory. A fair trading post with good people.
String.Dest: Maybe now we can restore this place back to its former glory. A fair trading post with good people.

String.Source: Surprised to hear the Disciples actually thought they could take you on. Believe me, I won't miss 'em.
String.Dest: Surprised to hear the Disciples actually thought they could take you on. Believe me, I won't miss 'em.

String.Source: That's why I did it. It benefits everyone.
String.Dest: That's why I did it. It benefits everyone.

String.Source: I haven't even taken a moment to think about that.
String.Dest: I haven't even taken a moment to think about that.

String.Source: Quit yapping and get back to work.
String.Dest: Quit yapping and get back to work.

String.Source: Good riddance. They were weak.
String.Dest: Good riddance. They were weak.

String.Source: That year we spent under those Raiders won't be easy to forget, but I never even dreamed we'd be getting out of this with our freedom.
String.Dest: That year we spent under those Raiders won't be easy to forget, but I never even dreamed we'd be getting out of this with our freedom.

String.Source: Surprised to hear the Pack actually thought they could take you on. Believe me, I won't miss 'em.
String.Dest: Surprised to hear the Pack actually thought they could take you on. Believe me, I won't miss 'em.

String.Source: And once word spreads about what you did here, no way any Raiders are going to think about touching this place any time soon.
String.Dest: And once word spreads about what you did here, no way any Raiders are going to think about touching this place any time soon.

String.Source: Just thought you'd like to know, is all. And don't worry, I'm getting my ass back to work.
String.Dest: Just thought you'd like to know, is all. And don't worry, I'm getting my ass back to work.

String.Source: And yeah, yeah... I know you didn't do it for us, but the traders feel like it's a real improvement anyway.
String.Dest: And yeah, yeah... I know you didn't do it for us, but the traders feel like it's a real improvement anyway.

String.Source: If there are any left, you'd think they'd be smart enough to get as far from Nuka-World as they could.
String.Dest: If there are any left, you'd think they'd be smart enough to get as far from Nuka-World as they could.

String.Source: You aren't so bad after all. I kept waiting for you to betray us, but you didn't.
String.Dest: You aren't so bad after all. I kept waiting for you to betray us, but you didn't.

String.Source: That was quite a battle with the robot. Quite a battle.
String.Dest: That was quite a battle with the robot. Quite a battle.

String.Source: We must finish our mission before the world is ground to dust under the rim of the great wheel of progress.
String.Dest: We must finish our mission before the world is ground to dust under the rim of the great wheel of progress.

String.Source: I'm glad we had a fighter like you to help us take the spaceship.
String.Dest: I'm glad we had a fighter like you to help us take the spaceship.

String.Source: Thanks for helping us capture the spaceship.
String.Dest: Thanks for helping us capture the spaceship.

String.Source: Jesus. Shit. They're gonna die.
String.Dest: Jesus. Shit. They're gonna die.

String.Source: This is all my fault. All my fault.
String.Dest: This is all my fault. All my fault.

String.Source: Oh God, they're going to kill them... I know it.
String.Dest: Oh God, they're going to kill them... I know it.

String.Source: Goddamn Raiders. I should have known.
String.Dest: Zatracení nájezdníci. Měl jsem to vědět.

String.Source: I lost my real family when Colter and his gangs took this place from us.
String.Dest: I lost my real family when Colter and his gangs took this place from us.

String.Source: I'm just... sorry you had to get caught up in all this.
String.Dest: I'm just... sorry you had to get caught up in all this.

String.Source: Hey, I may be surprised, but in a good way, all right? Just because I got you in here doesn't mean I didn't regret it.
String.Dest: Hey, I may be surprised, but in a good way, all right? Just because I got you in here doesn't mean I didn't regret it.

String.Source: Every time Colter sent me out to lure people into The Gauntlet, I didn't have a choice. I had to do it or he'd kill someone I cared about.
String.Dest: Every time Colter sent me out to lure people into The Gauntlet, I didn't have a choice. I had to do it or he'd kill someone I cared about.

String.Source: You never mentioned I was walking into a death trap.
String.Dest: You never mentioned I was walking into a death trap.

String.Source: Surprised to see me alive?
String.Dest: Surprised to see me alive?

String.Source: Now, these traders are all I have left. They're my family now.
String.Dest: Now, these traders are all I have left. They're my family now.
